Who: SCOURGE, Rat Trap, Quickstride
Location: Area around the Balck Fortress

> Outside the fortress, Quickstride can feel a massibe rumbling in his stomach. It wasn't Scourge that was scaring him, it was his overdosing of the gassy bean pods which was doing him in. He remains in robot mode as he seems to bloat a bit.
>
> Rat Trap gasps.
>
> "Uhhhh, ohhh... This doesn't look too good and it ain't gonna smell too good in a fraction of a few nanoseconds!"
>
> Without further a do, Quickstride erupts with a cloud of unbearable stench, which wafts upward into the air.

"Is that all you got?!?" Scourge sneered derisively. He easily flew
around the ball of gas, it floating so very slowly in the air, being
gently pushed by prevailing wind currents. However a bird that
happened to be flying through was not quite so fortunate. Due perhaps
to a lack of agility, or more likely just a lack of awareness of true
danger it was in flew into the cloud of odor and it began to fall from
skies.

Scourge in the meantime had taken the time to back around and was
comming for another run at the maximals when the alarms from the
fortress began to go off.

"SLAG!" Scourge grunted as he turned on his radio, "What's going on?"
he said as he flew back toward the fortress.

(TAG)

Preston
